notes.player:
May immediately charge an enemy that would trigger frighten you as free action if within range

When confronting an enemy that would cause you to make a test against the Frightened condition, you may instead immediately Charge (CRB pg. 207) the source of the test as an any-time Free Action, so long as they are within range and are a tangible threat (charging a Daemon is fine, charging the consequences of your actions is not). This talent may be used even if you have already done an Action.

requirement.value: 1 Advance in Melee and 1 Advance in Discipline
